io.sysmo.nchecks

Class Query

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sysmo.nchecks.Query

  • public class Query
extends java.lang.Object
    The Reply class contain all the values and data related to the execution of a module implementing NCheckInterface (a check module).
    See Also:
    Reply

    • Method Detail

      • getState

        public java.lang.Object getState()
        Retrieve the object stored from previous call. example: ... MyStateClass state = (MyStateClass) reply.getState(); if (state == null) { // initialize a new state then state = new MySateClass(); } ...
        Returns:
        an Object set from Reply.setState or null
        See Also:
        Reply.setState(Serializable)
